## 🌐 API Endpoints

The `API` exposes all backend logic via REST using Plumber.

- 📖 [API Documentation](../API/docs/index.html)
- 🧪 Test locally using tools like [Postman](https://www.postman.com/) or `curl`
- 🧾 Sample Endpoints:
  - `POST /deposit`
  - `POST /withdraw`
  - `GET /get_due_date`
  - `POST /set_account_type`
